name: Mafiya War Clash of Crime Simulator
name_original: Mafiya War Clash of Crime Simulator
description:
Mafiya War

You have an unique opportunity to become a major criminal! You can train skills of marksmanship, kill people and steal cars.
The action in this crime simulator 3D game revolves around shooting and killing your enemies.

The mafia world is a dangerous place and you need to know how to look after yourself
Want to build a Criminal Empire and crush your rivals? Get ready to show everyone who’s boss by fighting in open world real action game. Rule the streets in this action-packed game.

key features:

- Amazing township environment
- Real life weapons and gangster cars
- Realistic special effects
- Best crime simulator game feeling ever!!
- open world criminal gunfights
